meanings.definition: Excessively cautious or timid in one's actions or decisions.
meanings.sent1: She is overcautious when crossing the street, always waiting for the light to turn green twice.
meanings.sent2: The overcautious driver never exceeds the speed limit, even on empty roads.
meanings.sent3: The overcautious squirrel double-checked every acorn before storing it away for winter.
meanings.sent4: His overcautious nature was like a heavy anchor, preventing him from taking any risks.
meanings.sent5: The overcautious hiker meticulously checked every step on the rocky trail, afraid of slipping.
